main event: On July 20, 1961, Trans Texas Airlines flight 110 reported a sighting of a brilliant military installation and a similar object hovering above at approximately 30,000 feet.
interesting points: The pilots observed a glowing object hovering several thousand feet above them., The object was stationary for about 2 minutes before disappearing at a high rate of speed., The sighting was documented in a conversation with Beaumont Approach Control., There were no incidents during the flight after the sighting., The sighting lasted for a brief period but was taken seriously by air traffic control.
sighted object: brilliant military installation and hovering object
witness description: pilots of Trans Texas Airlines flight 110
